website_summaries.verdict: Fun Ariel doll that sings one of the most recognizable songs from The Little Mermaid.
pros: Includes a sparkly fin that is removable so Ariel can be both a mermaid and a human
Doll lights up as she sings "Part of Your World" from The Little Mermaid
cons: The part of the song the doll sings is very short

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to make a doll cake and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite Christmas toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES Ariel and this was definitely one of the biggest hits on Christmas. The best part was that we discovered the different setting on the back of her neck where you can change the song length from "preview" to "full song." She liked it before we even figured that out, but it's even better value for the money now!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: little girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter absolutely loves it and won't put it down! Highly recommend for any little girl who loves the little mermaid movies. However, on a parenting aspect... the song is loud, and can be super annoying after about 50 times on repeat! Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Grafted into truth ministries

customer_reviews.title: Little 3 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a recent birthday gift. The 3 year old girl loved it. It was a hit of the party.
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love and great
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a niece of mine. I was worried that the doll would look fake or something but when I received the doll I was very happy with her. Even better my niece loved her! My nieces favorite princess is Ariel <3
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a child
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this gift she got for Christmas. Daddy got in trouble with Mommy because I didn't realize it plays a song. So be prepared to hear it multiple times an hour when they first get it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett83501

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and loved by my daughters
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4yr old's birthday. Both she and her 1yr old sister love this doll and sing along with it. The hair gets messy with play, but like most doll hair does with littles playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo granddaughter went NUTS over this singing doll. I don’t know how long it will last, but it’s worth it. She has sand and danced with this doll for 2 solid days.
customer_reviews.author: DLGM

customer_reviews.title: This doll can't go in the pool or tub
customer_reviews.text: There are holes in the back of this doll for a speaker, so it can't be submerged in water. My granddaughter loves it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: dreaming420

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth $20! These singing dolls are made with beautiful detail. Kids love them! Although $20 seems a bit steep for a doll, nothing beats Disney brand quality
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive gift for little mermaid fans
customer_reviews.text: Niece who is a huge little mermaid fan loved it. Very glittery and sings when you push the shell on chest.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she loves it! It plays 2 songs (gotta look for that button on the back of the doll). O ly downside is she can't put it in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Adorra

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it for her birthday gift. She will be singing along with Ariel for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Craig

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Great doll. I wish it sang more than just one line or other songs but still a great present
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not shipped well
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but the box came damaged. So it wasn't really a nice presentable gift. Company should really think about packaging it in a box and not a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this one for Christmas. She loves Aerial plus she sings which makes it that much better.
customer_reviews.author: karen dupske

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: She loves Princess Ariel and the doll is so cute. The heart lights up and it sings.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ariel !
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughter for Christmas ! However she only sings like 1 sentence or less !
customer_reviews.author: Deaven Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandchild for Christmas. It hasn't broken or fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi and Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new addition to her musical collection.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to play with this. Make sure to change it so it will play the entire song.
customer_reviews.author: Dong Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good doll
customer_reviews.text: Very cute doll! My girls love it. Not too loud
customer_reviews.author: AAAmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrive on time. The product was in good condition. Do not know about the quality as it was given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cecylia Skvarla

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for Christmas. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: The doll is cute and she sings clearly but the song is so short it's not worth it. The song isn't even a full line from the song! Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaH

customer_reviews.title: So lovely
customer_reviews.text: She sings part of the little mermaid theame. The doll is beautiful. perfect disney princess gift
customer_reviews.author: FABIANA RORATO DUSO

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved for just a little bit more of the singing from the doll (felt it cut the song too short). My 4 year old niece loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Borsodi

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this mermaid. It only plays a small portion of the song but my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for Christmas and she’s been carrying it around since.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it! Awesome toy for the price
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Child loved but momma doesnt
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this doll, but I do not. Be aware there is no off switch
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath doll
customer_reviews.text: She’s attractive, My granddaughter loves the music and she holds up great in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: great toy for my 2 years and so affordable !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic doll
customer_reviews.text: Loved this doll! My daughter is obsessed with Ariel and she carries her around 24/7!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this, she sings along with Ariel now, #1 gift
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, I thought it was more of the song but literally like 3 words
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll, the singing button works well. my brothers niece will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I pay 16 dollars I think was a good price not 10dollars
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this product and I give it to one of my granddaughters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter - she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: kcamd3n

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet Disney  Princess
customer_reviews.text: It was just what my little girl was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Shimmering Song Ariel, Singing Doll
product_meta.description: Ariel is always ready to break into song, and in "part of your world, " she sings of her dreams To explore the world above the waves. With Disney Princess shimmering song Ariel, little dreamers eager to discover the whole wide world can join Ariel as she sings. With the push of a button, she sings her song as her glitter bodice lights up. Includes removable fin and tiara. copyright disneyhasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Beautiful fashion doll with sparkly tail
Bodice lights up as she sings
Imagine musical adventures with this hopeful Disney Princess
Includes doll, tiara, fin, and instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars421 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
